overview.description: JCL IBM efficiently manages and controls the execution of jobs on the mainframe, ensuring proper resource allocation and sequential processing of tasks.

dd_statement.logic:
DEFINE GENERATIONDATAGROUP -
   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.BKUP) -
    LIMIT(5) -
    SCRATCH -
   )
   IF LASTCC=12 THEN SET MAXCC=0
   DEFINE GENERATIONDATAGROUP -
   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.DALY) -
    LIMIT(5) -
    SCRATCH -
   )
   IF LASTCC=12 THEN SET MAXCC=0
   DEFINE GENERATIONDATAGROUP -
   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.TRANREPT) -
    LIMIT(5) -
    SCRATCH -
   )
   IF LASTCC=12 THEN SET MAXCC=0
   DEFINE GENERATIONDATAGROUP -
   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.TCATBALF.BKUP) -
    LIMIT(5) -
    SCRATCH -
   )
   IF LASTCC=12 THEN SET MAXCC=0
   DEFINE GENERATIONDATAGROUP -
   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.SYSTRAN) -
    LIMIT(5) -
    SCRATCH -
   )
   IF LASTCC=12 THEN SET MAXCC=0
   DEFINE GENERATIONDATAGROUP -
   (NAME(FPTLT01.DEMO.CARDDEMO.TRANSACT.COMBINED) -
    LIMIT(5) -
    SCRATCH -
   )
   IF LASTCC=12 THEN SET MAXCC=0
